text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It's the opening day of the Mainichi<n>Okan, an
important step toward the<n>Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
After I give her a bit of encouragement,<n>El
Condor Pasa declares she'll make a<n>sweeping
victory.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
However, her classmate Grass Wonder<n>will also
be running in the race, along<n>with the peerless
Silence Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Matched against incredibly talented<n>
Umamusume, she heads to the race to<n>prove
herself worthy of the Japan Cup.
